description: Object transformations implementing the Node.js `stream.Transform` API

name: stream-transform

scripts.build: npm run build:coffee && npm run build:babel && npm run build:browserify
scripts.build:browserify: browserify lib/index.js --transform babelify --standalone parse > lib/browser/index.js && browserify lib/sync.js --transform babelify --standalone parse > lib/browser/sync.js
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.preversion: grep '## Trunk' CHANGELOG.md && npm test && cp lib/*.ts lib/es5 && git add lib/es5/*.ts
scripts.version: version=`grep '^  "version": ' package.json | sed 's/.*"\([0-9\.]*\)".*/\1/'` && sed -i "s/## Trunk/## Version $version/" CHANGELOG.md && git add CHANGELOG.md
